participant_1.background:
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
i wait for something interesting to happen each day.
My weight is 160 pounds.

i ca swim very fast.
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
i have freckles.
i am allergic to dust.

content.text: Hello! How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, too! Thanks for asking.
That's good to hear! What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, practicing guitar. What about you?
I'm teaching a class, then I'm going swimming.
Oh, that sounds fun! I'm not very good at swimming, but I like it.
I'm pretty good at it, I used to race competitively.
That's cool! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
Oh, that's cool! I like to play rock too.
Have you been playing guitar for long?
I've been playing for about 10 years.
Oh, that's a long time! Do you play in a band?
No, I don't. I just play for fun.
Oh, that's cool. I used to play in a band, but I don't have time anymore.
That's too bad. I'm sure you were good.
Thanks! I think I was okay.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot going on. Have a good day!
Thanks, you too
